root: ^<sp:25>So...are you the one I'm supposed to meet with here?
^<sp:25>Hmm...I don't think so. Haven't met ya before!
^<sp:50>Uh, okay. Why are you here then?
^<sp:25>To be perfectly honest with you<p:normal>...I've no idea! But what I <anim:wave>do</anim> know is I want to <anim:shake>GROOVE!</anim>
